```{r}
#| message: false
library(VariantAnnotation)
```

```{r}
vcf_data <- readVcf("../workflow-dna-seq-gatk-variant-calling/results/filtered/all.norm.filtered.vcf.gz")
vcf_data
```

```{r}
is_het <- function(sample) {
  geno(vcf_data)[["GT"]][, sample] %in% c("0/1", "1/0", "0|1", "1|0")
}
is_not_het <- function(sample) {
  geno(vcf_data)[["GT"]][, sample] %in% c("0/0", "0|0", "1|1", "1/1")
}
```


```{r}
keep <- is_het("D129")
rowRanges(vcf_data)[keep,]
```

```{r}
keep <- is_het("D129") & is_not_het("D441")
rowRanges(vcf_data)[keep,]
```
